descriptionHTML:
Grand Battle Royale Season 2018! If you like military blocky pixel games and battle royale games then you will definitely like Grand Battle Royale!

BATTLE in online multiplayer games when you play the new massive open world game! Survive the battlegrounds, improve your shooting skills, and develop new PVP tactics for FREE!
Jump out of the survival plane on the dead island, find the best loot, kill the enemies. Players are spread around the island unarmed and must find and use various weapons and items to eliminate opponents. Find the best weapons you can: Assault Rifle, pixel gun, smg, shotguns and other weapons. Dominate the battlefield by taking on each opponent and become last survivor #1! Grab your pixel gun and get shooting!

The location of the battlegrounds is a distant island with dead city somewhere in the sea surrounded with a mysterious Blue Zone. Your main task is to stay inside the safe zone and eliminate all your enemies.

Features:
• Pixel Graphics & Blocky Characters: Battle as hilarious blocky characters and show your style of gameplay.
• Survive gun games against other players!
• Battle in Online Multiplayer Games: Intense PVP gameplay against players around the world!
• Guns will randomly appear, so search the ground thoroughly! Survive by collecting more guns so you have an advantage over other players.
• Just like in true 3D block survival games, you can purchase any pixel block strike skins.
• Grab a pixel gun and dive into battle: Fun pixel graphics great for intense shooting battles!
• Big radiation island this is the place where you have to survive while you playing in the blocky city.
• Multiplayer game is absolutely free online game for download.

Become the last man standing, the last hero, the king of the battlefield! Good luck, good hunt!
This game requires an internet connection.

comments: I love this game up until it asked me for a loan for one of the characters for 250 gems that i purchased. I contact Tech support and nothing is being done. After this last update I lost slot. It started off awesome but once I started investing money in the game it's like it just took my money by taking the gifts and coins.  Such a waste of time and money when no corrections are made.  Trying to give the developer a chance to redeem themselves from this error.

I like the idea of changing prices and finding new recipes. I want the barista to automatically start the machines if there isn't one already there. i want to be able to hire another barista. I want to put my menu on the other wall. I want smaller windows. There's basically a lot of things i feel limited on and i still haven't figured out if i can change the color on wallpaper or not.

I watched the 4 adverts and got a no diamonds for the doing so. I also watched the the add to pick a bonus prize, never got a that either. I used to play this game a lot and I've noticed the prices of everything have went up and including the spices. You no longer have the option to buy the cheaper furniture forcing you to spend more so customers come in to the Cafe. Very greedy and game makers. Sort these issues and give me the diamonds I'm owed or take away the ads.

I'm used to like this game very much, addicting and lovely although it is so p2w. After certain update my game will start to reverse progress itself when one message pop out and state "profile change, please restart". Recently this problem occur very frequent and its so unbearable and irritating when what u done it just become undone, ALWAYS.  Im so fed up with this and quit for few days, wish developer can fix or lessen this issues or i will just uninstall it one day, thanks for reading.

In the world of cafe games this one is a gem that stands out like a diamond in the rough. Fun and easy to play, it's set at a relaxing pace with you learning new recipes and chatting with your customers. Who are all really interesting people with unique storylines....I think one of them is trying to steal the Mona Lisa,lol.

Fix the controls! Atleast have an option to enable and disable the editing of the layout or location of the items in-game. Such a pain that God-forbid you touched an item for a half a second too long it will prompt you to move, delete or put that item in storage.

descriptionHTML:
My Cafe is an addictive bakery & restaurant story game where you set off to help chef Ann open a classy cafe and serve her guests delicious drinks and baked goods.

The first episodes of your coffee shop adventure begins as you set off to a quiet town and open your own classy cafe with your friend Ann! Serve coffee, cook bakery goods and immerse yourself in an addictive kitchen & restaurant simulator that’s brimming with exciting tales and stories.

Download My Cafe: Recipes & Stories and tell your cooking story!

Exciting features in this restaurant simulator lets you:
★ Build and scramble a diner, pizza bakery, or restaurant – hire staff, buy furniture, improve the kitchen and set prices on the menu.
★ Design your coffee shop with tons of glamorous decorative items – After all, comfort is in the details! Be the brightest café on the street.
★ Discover baking and cooking, including special food and drinks like the Sweet Tales Latte, the Mojito Cupcake, and more. Feel the cooking fever in our eating game!
★ Develop your own business strategy and management take big risks or go for slow to ensure you make a profit and thrive in Cafeland game.
★ Bring your restaurant to life with impactful stories and colorful customers for kids and adults. Gossip with regulars and choose your own responses to influence the direction of the story, and make new friends in your neighborhood. Each story is unique in My Cafe: Recipes & Stories!

Features:

My Restaurant, My Cafe Story
• Story mode with unique characters and meaningful relationships. Learn the stories of your regulars, influence their gossip life, make new friends and experience your own Kitchen Craze restaurant adventure in this nice life simulator.

Cafe Treats & Bakery Sweets
• Coffee mania, fast food, dinners, desserts and hot drinks for cafe fans of pizza games from crazy kitchen!
• Bakery treats and restaurant eats!
• Special baking and cooking recipes like the Sweet Tales Latte, the Mojito Cupcake!

Restaurant Mania & Cafe Simulator
• Design your own coffee shop with over 900 decorative items
• Make a business paradise at your cafe by taking big risks or going slow and steady.
• Manage restaurant staff, hire, train and fire your employees in our making food game

Customized Cafe & Bakery Story - Gossip & Intrigue Abound
• Coffee shop gossip goes a long way! Investigate the town’s story, see how characters fall in love, make their choices and discover secrets the whole cartoon city wants to know!

Play with friends
Go social – see how your Facebook friends are running their own coffee shops and townships in your favorite game!

My Cafe: Recipes & Stories is the restaurant story of a lifetime inside a casual game! Gossip with cafe guests and meet new friends in a story mode so deliciously addictive for girls, you’ll never want to put it down! Become a happy world chef and build your bakery, sushi cafe, diner or restaurant with cooking dash to make the best dishes and drinks in a story game that lets you play your way, choose your story and start a true!

However, some in-game items can be purchased for real money. If you wish to disable this feature, please turn off in-app purchases in your device’s settings.

My Cafe: Recipes & Stories is FREE to download and play with no obligations to pay.

Note:
An internet connection is required to play our cooking game

SUPPORT
Chef, are you having a problem with the game? Please contact us by going to the game Settings > FAQ or visit https://goo.gl/Bw6QVb.
Our support service: http://melesta.freshdesk.com/support/tickets/new

Play the best episode of games with your friends, including friends from Facebook, and bring your exciting restaurant story to life in the exciting new business simulator My Cafe: Recipes & Stories. Join in the fun!

Time management games fans from all over the world have already started their restaurant story.

How to develop your coffee shop and choose your own story:
Facebook - http://www.facebook.com/MyCafeGame
developerAddress: 105, Agion Omologiton Avenue, 1080 Nicosia, Cyprus
recentChanges: IN THIS UPDATE:
• A new character, Mike, and the story "The Corporation" at level 28
• A new story, "Fashion and Jackhammers," at level 28
• New furniture added at level 25 and above
Completing both stories allows players to reach level 29 and unlock new content.
FOR VIPs:
• Customers indicate the remaining number of attempts when ordering another special recipe
summary: Cooking, Design & Cafe Management - all with a fun story! Own a Restaurant ☕☕
title: My Cafe: Recipes & Stories - World Cooking Game

description: Welcome to the dojo, ninja. Your objective: become a master of slicing fruit! What better way to do that than play Fruit Ninja, the original hit fruit-slicing mobile game? 🍉Unsheathe your blade and start the juicy carnage with the three classic game modes that billions of players have come to know and love. Experience the thrill of setting a new high score in the fan-favourite Arcade mode as you focus on dodging bombs and slicing massive combos with the help of the special Double Score, Freeze or Frenzy bananas. Need something less intense? Simply relax and slash for stress relief in Zen Mode. Finally, cut as much as you can in the endless Classic mode – just avoid the bombs and make sure you don’t drop the fruit! Make your game even more exciting by equipping special powerups that will give your score a juicy boost. 🍓Once you’ve sharpened your skills and reflexes, put them to the test in Event mode, where you’ll enter challenging and intense clashes with characters like Truffles the pig, Mari and Rinjin for the chance to win unique swords and dojos that can be used in Classic, Zen and Arcade mode. Spice up your day and make yourself more energetic in our daily Challenge mode - can you out-slice the other ninjas for special prizes and glory? 🏆Prove to your friends and family that you’re the top ninja around. Show them how much you can cut in a shared-screen local multiplayer match, or compare your score with your friends to rise through the ranks and reach the top of the leaderboard! Big fan of Fruit Ninja: Puss in Boots? Be sure to challenge yourself with the entertaining and addictive minigames and find your favourite! 🍒What are you waiting for? Whether you're playing for some mindless fun and trying to relax and pass the time, or trying to improve your skills as a master ninja, this is the game for you. Enjoy the awesomeness and believe the hype of Fruit Ninja – chop chop! ⚔️View our privacy policy at http://halfbrick.com/pp View our terms of service at http://halfbrick.com/tosNeed help with the game? Email us at fruitninja@halfbrick.com
descriptionHTML:
Welcome to the dojo, ninja. Your objective: become a master of slicing fruit! What better way to do that than play Fruit Ninja, the original hit fruit-slicing mobile game? 🍉

Unsheathe your blade and start the juicy carnage with the three classic game modes that billions of players have come to know and love. Experience the thrill of setting a new high score in the fan-favourite Arcade mode as you focus on dodging bombs and slicing massive combos with the help of the special Double Score, Freeze or Frenzy bananas. Need something less intense? Simply relax and slash for stress relief in Zen Mode. Finally, cut as much as you can in the endless Classic mode – just avoid the bombs and make sure you don’t drop the fruit! Make your game even more exciting by equipping special powerups that will give your score a juicy boost. 🍓

Once you’ve sharpened your skills and reflexes, put them to the test in Event mode, where you’ll enter challenging and intense clashes with characters like Truffles the pig, Mari and Rinjin for the chance to win unique swords and dojos that can be used in Classic, Zen and Arcade mode. Spice up your day and make yourself more energetic in our daily Challenge mode - can you out-slice the other ninjas for special prizes and glory? 🏆

Prove to your friends and family that you’re the top ninja around. Show them how much you can cut in a shared-screen local multiplayer match, or compare your score with your friends to rise through the ranks and reach the top of the leaderboard! Big fan of Fruit Ninja: Puss in Boots? Be sure to challenge yourself with the entertaining and addictive minigames and find your favourite! 🍒

What are you waiting for? Whether you're playing for some mindless fun and trying to relax and pass the time, or trying to improve your skills as a master ninja, this is the game for you. Enjoy the awesomeness and believe the hype of Fruit Ninja – chop chop! ⚔️

View our privacy policy at http://halfbrick.com/pp
View our terms of service at http://halfbrick.com/tos
Need help with the game? Email us at fruitninja@halfbrick.com

Well, I admit, I'm addicted to this. The levels are SO FUN, and also quite challenging. Sometimes,yes, I rage, but it wouldn't be fun if it was too easy.The animation is sophisticated, the music is AMAZING (my two favorite songs are Clutterfunk and Can't Let Go) and they give you a TON of levels for a free trial. comments: Is this game for You? Do you enjoy spending most of the game watching ads? Do you enjoy games that make it impossible to play without spending real money? Do you enjoy being grabbed by the crotch so hard you change genders?  If you answered yes or no to any of these then no this game is not for you. It's nothing but a crappy game designed to rake in as much money as possible, rather than making something fun. Forced to watch 30 second ads after each round. Forced to use the currency you earn when you don't want too. Enemy power will suddenly jump up 10 fold making spells and goldimpossible to gain without watching an addition 30 second ad. Even if you win and get the key you are forced to watch a 30 sec ad to unlock as if you didn't get a key.

Good little time waster, simple classic gameplay but puts its own unique twist on it.   Side note: I clearly played this game more than they thought anyone would as I have started getting repeated designs when I upgrade my spells xD

It stopped working on my One plus! Help! I was excited about the side games! *********************************** Excellent, addictive fun. I reached shield 135 (level 1154) and it doesn't level up any more. Gutted! Still a great game but so sad I can't progress any more. No reason why really! Incidentally, good for helping kids with Mathematics.

All in all it is a really great game there are very few ads, its fun, the graphics are crisp. Its amazing except for one thing. On one of the levels all of the monsters have exactly 666 health and im not religious or anything but I'm pretty sure that if some one who is religious see's that, well lets just say that it might not be good for the company, so I suggest you fix this.  Thanks.

Concept and gameplay is ok, but, like others have said, there are way too many ads. Also the special spells you can unlock are given to you at random. Have a aituation that drill would be great for? Too bad take explosion.

Fun game but takes forever to get gold to upgrade. The cost to pay for the gems to buy so you can buy gold is really expensive. Not much dynamic to the game. Same stuff on each level just takes longer to bet enemies cause of higher HP.
description: Looking for a way to enter the world of magic? Well then look no further than Bounzy! - the newest title by Gram Games. You’re a mage, facing an onslaught of fantastic beasts. Using your mystic powers, fight them back, and protect your town. As your spells strike the beasts, they will lose health - just make sure they’re fully vanquished before they reach you. Each attack you stave off will reward you with a chest. Destroy all enemies to find its key and unlock valuable diamonds and gold, which you can use to improve your strength and skill.The more powerful your spells, and the stronger your defenses, the more likely you are to succeed. Visit the laboratory to build the strength of your spells. Venture into the academy to learn special spells that will help you to defeat the enemies. And make sure to maintain the strength of your wall - these beasts have a knack for breaking through faulty barriers.Think you can protect your town? Try Bounzy! today.
descriptionHTML:
Looking for a way to enter the world of magic? Well then look no further than Bounzy! - the newest title by Gram Games. You’re a mage, facing an onslaught of fantastic beasts. Using your mystic powers, fight them back, and protect your town. As your spells strike the beasts, they will lose health - just make sure they’re fully vanquished before they reach you. Each attack you stave off will reward you with a chest. Destroy all enemies to find its key and unlock valuable diamonds and gold, which you can use to improve your strength and skill.

The more powerful your spells, and the stronger your defenses, the more likely you are to succeed. Visit the laboratory to build the strength of your spells. Venture into the academy to learn special spells that will help you to defeat the enemies. And make sure to maintain the strength of your wall - these beasts have a knack for breaking through faulty barriers.

Think you can protect your town? Try Bounzy! today.
developerAddress: 100 Cambridge Grove, The Aircraft Factory, London W6 0LE, United Kingdom
recentChanges: Special Events are coming to Bounzy! with this update. Make sure to check the game daily - you don’t want to miss them!
- Bug fixes (Including the issue with not being able to level up beyond 135).
- Visual and performance improvements.
summary: Think you can protect your town? Try Bounzy! today.
title: Bounzy!

comments: Almost two years later and still love the game. It is a good game to relax to. I do spend money occassionally on the game but the game is not "pay to play". That means you can progress through it without even spending a dime. Its a simple game with decent graphics to play at leisure and has become my current pass time.  Update 3/22/18  I decreased my rating to three stars (from 5) until the developer can correct the latest flop from most recent update. Flop regards being able to log in but paralyzed from any action that requires an in game pop up. I including the "Help" module which is used to contact dev with. If no improvement after a week, I will delete game and draw stars to 0.

I've always loved this game, but my tickets go ignored for days. Latest update has handicapped me completely in that I cannot click on anything or log off 1 world to log onto my other world. The game is starting to suffer because of bad customer service. Reduced my rating to 1 star until they get their act together. To think I've actually spent real money on this game and can't get a timely answer.
The latest update has locked me out of the ability to select anything. Its like pop ups have been disabled. I used real money in this game and now i cant play.Fix it please! Samsung note 4

I hate to leave 1 star just to get a developer's attention, but I have been unsuccessful in contacting customer support. Since the update, buttons in Uceria are no longer clickable. I cannot even access the second world I play in because I am locked into Uceria. I have uninstalled and reinstalled,but still does not work. Please help!
Downgraded to 1 star until the latest bug is fixed. Frustrating to say the least!
Good response from Dev. Great game, slow for newbies but worth to be patient.
description: Come and play Forge of Empires! Take control over a city and become the leader of an aspiring kingdom. Guide it through the ages, research new technologies, expand your empire and live through an epic story. Battle other players and prove your skills as king and warlord.FEATURES- Build your city and evolve from the Stone Age to modern times (and beyond).- Develop new technologies and discover new buildings and goods- Produce supplies to manufacture goods- Exchange your goods and trade with your neighbors- Discover new territories and seize control of the provinces and their rewards- Use your negotiation or battle skills to take over sector by sectorForge of Empires is based on our successful browser strategy game which was published by InnoGames, developers of fantasy strategy game Elvenar, in the summer of 2012. Finally, the online strategy game is available for Android as well, providing cross-platform access. Forge of Empires is free to download and install. However, some game features can also be purchased for real money. If you don't want to use this feature, please disable in­app purchases in your device's settings. A network connection is also required.Imprint:	https://legal.innogames.com/portal/us/imprint
descriptionHTML:
Come and play Forge of Empires! Take control over a city and become the leader of an aspiring kingdom. Guide it through the ages, research new technologies, expand your empire and live through an epic story. Battle other players and prove your skills as king and warlord.

FEATURES

- Build your city and evolve from the Stone Age to modern times (and beyond).
- Develop new technologies and discover new buildings and goods
- Produce supplies to manufacture goods
- Exchange your goods and trade with your neighbors
- Discover new territories and seize control of the provinces and their rewards
- Use your negotiation or battle skills to take over sector by sector

Forge of Empires is based on our successful browser strategy game which was published by InnoGames, developers of fantasy strategy game Elvenar, in the summer of 2012. Finally, the online strategy game is available for Android as well, providing cross-platform access.

Forge of Empires is free to download and install. However, some game features can also be purchased for real money. If you don't want to use this feature, please disable in­app purchases in your device's settings. A network connection is also required.

Imprint: https://legal.innogames.com/portal/us/imprint
developerAddress:
InnoGames GmbH
Friesenstraße 13
20097 Hamburg
Germany
recentChanges: SPRING EVENT (March 28th - April 19th)
Welcome to the Cherry Blossom Festival! Get Spring Lanterns from quests and cherry trees around your city. Use them to get fantastic prizes - including improved buildings with set bonuses!
BUGFIXES
We solved a few issues with the game.
Thank you for playing Forge of Empires!
summary: Build and advance your city from a stone age village to a future metropolis.
title: Forge of Empires

descriptionHTML:
Best. Farm. Ever. Welcome to Hay Day, the most popular farming game on mobiles and tablets, number one in 122 countries.

Learn the lay of the land, tend to your crops, and trade goods with neighbors and friends. It’s a real special place where the crops never die even though it never rains. Sharing the farm with our quirky animals only makes things more fun!

PLEASE NOTE! Hay Day is free to download and install. However, some game items can also be purchased for real money. If you do not want to use this feature, please set up password protection for purchases in the settings of your Google Play Store app. A network connection is also required.

~~~~~~~~~~
FEATURES
~~~~~~~~~~
♥ Grow and customize your farm
♥ Trade crops and fresh goods with neighbors and friends through your very own roadside shop
♥ Fulfill orders with your truck and even by steamboat
♥ Repair your dock and cast your lure to fish the waters
♥ Build your own town and welcome visitors

~~~~~~~~~~~
MEDIA MENTIONS

description: Tiered of far too same games, stories and experiences? Looking for something thrilling and unique? You’ve found it!Welcome to The Island – place where there’s no time to be bored. Where two lost kids urgently need your help to survive. Where numerous hidden treasures are waiting for you to hunt for them. Where ancient Archipelagos pop up from nowhere to be explored. Where hundreds of quests, missions and puzzles makes you feel challenged every day. You’ll dig it. But remember! – The Island has The Secret.Island Experiment features:♥ Help two lost kids survive on The Island♥ Turn an abandoned beach into a flourishing farm♥ Grow food, craft equipment, build a seaside city♥ Explore the Island and its Heartland♥ Hunt for hidden treasures♥ Travel to ancient Archipelagos♥ Reveal a mystery of a Pyramid♥ Complete thrilling quests & challenging missions♥ Gain unique rewards♥ Collect lovable local pets♥ Play with your friends and make new onesAnd… have fun!The game is free to play and addictive. descriptionHTML:
Tiered of far too same games, stories and experiences? Looking for something thrilling and unique? You’ve found it!

Welcome to The Island – place where there’s no time to be bored. Where two lost kids urgently need your help to survive. Where numerous hidden treasures are waiting for you to hunt for them. Where ancient Archipelagos pop up from nowhere to be explored. Where hundreds of quests, missions and puzzles makes you feel challenged every day. You’ll dig it.

But remember! – The Island has The Secret.

Island Experiment features:

♥ Help two lost kids survive on The Island
♥ Turn an abandoned beach into a flourishing farm
♥ Grow food, craft equipment, build a seaside city
♥ Explore the Island and its Heartland
♥ Hunt for hidden treasures
♥ Travel to ancient Archipelagos
♥ Reveal a mystery of a Pyramid
♥ Complete thrilling quests & challenging missions
♥ Gain unique rewards
♥ Collect lovable local pets
♥ Play with your friends and make new ones
And… have fun!

The game is free to play and addictive. Be careful!

Support:
https://islandexperiment.zendesk.com/hc/en-us/requests/new

recentChanges: Brave Explorers!
New exciting opportunities for you in this Island Experiment update:

● This Delivery Festival is going to be legendary! Welcome to the Treasure Cave full of mysterious chests. What’s inside? Hit or miss! Get loads of treasures or lose it all. But don’t worry: you have 5 tries. Test your luck!
● Upgrade! Much better app performance & bug fixes for your better gaming experience;
Update and start treasure hunting!
summary: Welcome to a fun jungle adventure! Enjoy the paradise!
title: Island Experiment

comments: Great potential, but there needs to be a way to earn free gems for the abundance of chest I have... Also there needs to be time to clean up the map once The main objective is completed and definently more chalice for chances to complete levels, I only have a certain amount of time to play so I need to fit it into my time, not yours.... Ok game but not a great game for the players, micro-transaction heavy and very little chances to complete the levels.

Really enjoy the game. Relaxing and addicting. However, i dont like the large amounts of lock chests taking up my camp space. I think the lock chests are too much of a push to get me to buy crystals. Chances of getting crystals seem slim and with the small amount of space available for other things, this is a down side for me. If i have to pay to open chests that i have been rewarded, why play? That might be  something that causes me to quit the game before too long.

When I first downloaded this game it was fun...now, all the dragons only have a stamina of 1 and now you need trophies to play levels. These trophies take f-o-r-e-v-e-r to accumulate. These things have made the game drag on way too long. And accomplishing any thing may also cost actual money now. I have read other reviews about the money system of this game and I will not be throwing my money down this drain.

Loved this game at the start. But since last update it has crashed on me several times. Today alone it has crashed on me 3 times. I lost all my camp progress each time and had to start again and of course each time is different because it is impossible to duplicate. Today I also lost my dragon gems and dragons I had created prior to crashes. There fore I lost my money spent. I also lost my daily chest which  contained 2 life trees and a super egg fragment.  I am very upset and dissatisfied now and regret spending money on this game that I loved prior to all the crashes.

Please remove The Challenges. The timer runs out too early on all of the challenges, all the way up to challenge 20. I have all the standard levels finished. I have been waiting for you to make new standard levels. The timer is cheating people in your challenges. There is no way they can be completed. I am not buying 50 gems to add 2 minutes. That's a waste of my money.

The game is great but customer service is non- existent. I bought the 30 day gem special that was supposed to come with an egg and fountain. Got the gems (so far)but not the extra items. Tried contacting customer support several times but following their M.O., they never respond.
description: Discover dragon legends, magic, quests, and a secret land of entertainment and mystery in the world of Merge Dragons! where you can combine everything into better and better things by matching! In a mystical world hidden among the clouds, the vale of Dragonia flourished. Then evil Zomblins cast a void across the vale. The only hope to heal the land rests in YOUR magical power to MATCH ANYTHING -- dragon eggs, trees, treasures, stars, magical flowers, and even mythical creatures.Match eggs to hatch helpful dragons, then evolve them to discover more powerful dragons! Figure out challenging puzzle levels: match the Gaia statues to win, then bring rewards back to your Camp to collect and grow.What will you discover as you match your camp to perfection and nurture your dragons?MERGE DRAGONS! FEATURES:== Match Objects ==• Discover over 500 fantastic objects to match and interact with.• Freely drag objects around the beautiful world and match 3 of a kind evolve them into better things!• Match nearly anything - plants, buildings, coins, treasures, fallen stars, magic objects, mythical creatures, and more!• Match Life Essence and tap it to unleash power to heal the vale!• Discover the Gaia statues stuck in each level’s cursed land. Match them to solve the puzzle and create life!== Collect New Dragon Breeds ==• Discover 17 dragon breeds who live in the vale, and evolve them through 8 growth stages for new dragons!• Match eggs to hatch helpful dragons who will roam the vale and harvest objects for you to use or match.== Tricky Puzzles ==• Over 600 quests to challenge your mind!• Test your puzzle solving skills in more than 140 tricky levels filled with new quests and rewards to help you build your dragon camp!• Discover hidden levels - can you find them all?• On your puzzle journey, you may cross paths with evil Zomblins. Watch out and be careful!Download now and discover where Merge Dragons! will take you!Merge Dragons! is brought to you by Gram Games, the studio behind the top hit titles 1010!, Merged!, Six!, Bounzy!, Merge Town!, Merge Farm!, and Paint Tower!Optimized for Tablets. No Internet connection required.
descriptionHTML:
Discover dragon legends, magic, quests, and a secret land of entertainment and mystery in the world of Merge Dragons! where you can combine everything into better and better things by matching!

In a mystical world hidden among the clouds, the vale of Dragonia flourished. Then evil Zomblins cast a void across the vale. The only hope to heal the land rests in YOUR magical power to MATCH ANYTHING -- dragon eggs, trees, treasures, stars, magical flowers, and even mythical creatures.

Match eggs to hatch helpful dragons, then evolve them to discover more powerful dragons! Figure out challenging puzzle levels: match the Gaia statues to win, then bring rewards back to your Camp to collect and grow.

What will you discover as you match your camp to perfection and nurture your dragons?

MERGE DRAGONS! FEATURES:

== Match Objects ==
• Discover over 500 fantastic objects to match and interact with.
• Freely drag objects around the beautiful world and match 3 of a kind evolve them into better things!
• Match nearly anything - plants, buildings, coins, treasures, fallen stars, magic objects, mythical creatures, and more!
• Match Life Essence and tap it to unleash power to heal the vale!
• Discover the Gaia statues stuck in each level’s cursed land. Match them to solve the puzzle and create life!

== Collect New Dragon Breeds ==
• Discover 17 dragon breeds who live in the vale, and evolve them through 8 growth stages for new dragons!
• Match eggs to hatch helpful dragons who will roam the vale and harvest objects for you to use or match.

== Tricky Puzzles ==
• Over 600 quests to challenge your mind!
• Test your puzzle solving skills in more than 140 tricky levels filled with new quests and rewards to help you build your dragon camp!
• Discover hidden levels - can you find them all?
• On your puzzle journey, you may cross paths with evil Zomblins. Watch out and be careful!

Download now and discover where Merge Dragons! will take you!

Merge Dragons! is brought to you by Gram Games, the studio behind the top hit titles 1010!, Merged!, Six!, Bounzy!, Merge Town!, Merge Farm!, and Paint Tower!

Optimized for Tablets. No Internet connection required.
developerAddress: 100 Cambridge Grove, The Aircraft Factory, London W6 0LE, United Kingdom
recentChanges: - NEW LEVELS! 11 New Levels in Cloud Land! This includes new cloud puzzles: find the right object to clear the clouds!
- Adjusted the Daily Chest to respawn after 23 hours instead of 24 hours, to help alleviate scheduling creep a bit.
- Added Turkish Language support
- Fixed the case where the camera could fly off in the opposite direction when panning, especially when playing in large levels or a bustling camp.
summary: Match everything in your world to create life and heal the land!
title: Merge Dragons!

comments: Its a super fun game and I liked it. But for some reason every 5 seconds an internet browser would pop up saying I had a virus on my phone. Checked my phone but nothing. It never did this with any other app even before downloading this. Only ever happened when playing the game.

I actually like the game, but I got all the guys in 3 days.... Now what? There are no upgrades or any other options to use the money on. Also the same thing is happening as others said, where the browser keeps popping up saying there is a virus. Pretty annoying

Fun game, very entertaining. Ads pop up too often, it opens my browser saying i have a virus. I cant avoid it and it happens very often. Im only keeping the app bc i hope the next update fixes this issue. Other than the stupid pop up its a great game and i enjoy it. Please fix it so i dont have to uninstall.

I wanted to enjoy this game. The advertisements randomly open chrome browser windows with a fake virus scan saying "your device is infected." Its ironic in that the software that you're prompted to download is terrible adware that an actual scanner might flag.  It's quite persistent too, happening only after I installed this. 30 second video ads midgsme and adbars that just so happen to pop up and hover where you have to click in-game.

I love the game as a whole, and I just barely redownloaded it and it saved my progress, but I can't even get through one whole throw without it opening up chrome with a fake survey or whatever. I'm not joking, it's really bad. That's why I can't give this a good rating. I understand the need for ads in a free game, but for whatever reason, mine is nothing but ads.

I did not play this game for a long time. I download it and I only played it for maybe 2 hours. I tried to play, but when I  was in the middle of the game and it froze and sent me back to my home screen. The controls I like. This is not the greatest game I have seen, but It's ok😐😐😞😞

comments: Simple design with good possibilities, but several of the adds pop up and tell me there is a virus on my brand new phone and it can not be closed out.  The internet browser has to be shut down to close it.  Has potential for fun, but too much time wasted trying to close false adds.

I really like this game because 1, it is funny, a sausage running through a kitchen dodging all these obstacles, you have to admit that is kinda funny, 2nd I like how you can unlock so many different sausage skins, who would have thought that there would be so many different kinds of sausage, and finally, 3rd, I also like how you can play with other people, you can play with other people because you can take turns, when one person dies in the game it's the next persons turn. This game is awesome and all about tactics, and I love it. This game deserves a five star!🖒

The game it's self isn't bad but it's also nothing new. It's just a copy off of different idea's but that does't really matter. What matters is that there's a constant redirect ever 30 seconds! It sends you to a website and it's often and very stupid... And if a redirect isn't bad enough it no joke happens to me in the middle of game play. You can be playing and all the sudden here comes a redirect... !
This game is extremely glitchy. Also I see great time killer on EVERY APP! Are the developers doing this? I don't know but, that doesn't take away the fact that it's SUPER LAGGY!

Loved the game, but every minute or so the game will minimise and chrome will open to some page in poor English saying "you have 4 virus!! Etc, etc." Not even sure if its this developer's fault or not,  but the game is unplayable because of that spam ad...

The new black characters you put out are terrible (bolt and williams). Its like youre making fun out of them. They are so detailed in a bad way. And everyone else like justin bieber look "normal". Yall need to do better 🙄🙄🙄🤡🤡🤡.

comments: Amazing game!! I have purchased 1 or 2 bikes already, I would even pay to get new bikes, but it is very expensive. Please consider lowering to prices or making better bikes more accessible. Ive been stuck on the same level for 5 weeks. I want to continue playing but im loosing intrest not being able to advance. Maybe you could trade your old bikes in to get something in return for a newer bike. Im sure you will never read this, but you do have something special here! Thanks

Very fun BMX pump game. Seen a few reviews say it's gets impossible after level 3 when it becomes pay to win. I don't agree I've just reached level 8 in a few hours. If you ride bikes off road and understand how to pump you'll love it

Its way to hard to win and and the stats do nothing.  You have to be perfect and even then they fly by.  Still LOVE this game.  Just takes away the fun when you get left in the dust and you play the same lvl a million times hoping maybe one time you will be perfect.

I loved this game for 3 days. Then it got to the point where I couldn't beat a level without upgrading my bike, but I couldn't upgrade my bike without spending real money. So disappointing. Don't waste your time if you don't want to spend real money!

The game is fun up until around the third level. After that it becomes near impossible to win any races without spending actual money to upgrade your bike. Had a lot of fun with it up until that point, but it's definitely not worth spending actual money on. Deleted the game after pay to win clearly became a necessity.

It was fun for a while - until it becomes impossible to beat any opponents with your current bike. The difficulty spikes around level 7 and the process of buying a new bike or upgrading your existing one becomes very frustrating, as you can't win any races to earn any money.
description: Mad Skills BMX 2 has finally arrived! See for yourself why Mad Skills games have been installed more than 40 million times worldwide, by action sports enthusiasts, professional athletes, and casual gamers alike. This is side-scrolling racing action as you’ve never experienced it, racing against people from across the globe on carefully designed tracks that will challenge your skills and — sometimes — your sanity.- Amazing physics that combine elements of realism with arcade fun- 7 different bikes that can be unlocked, upgraded, and customized- Tons of rider customization options to help you achieve your own on-track look- Dozens of hand-crafted tracks, with more added every single week for free- Weekly Jam competitions carried over from the smash-hit game Mad Skills Motocross 2- Competition with friends, people from your state or region, and international players- Evil bosses to defeat — a Mad Skills first!Mad Skills BMX 2 will get major developer support, ensuring tons of meaningful updates in the weeks, months, and years to come. We already have additional game modes in the works!Learn tips and tricks by watching our weekly show, The Turborilla Show, at twitch.com/turborillagames!Support: turborilla.helpshift.com/a/bmx-2/ (Have a problem? Contact us and let us make it right!)Facebook: facebook.com/madskillsbmxTwitter: twitter.com/madskillsbmx

- Amazing physics that combine elements of realism with arcade fun

comments: I enjoy this lifetime favorite with people worldwide, and Uno Dare is my most favorite mode. I understand it will be discontinued in June and I wish it wasn't so.    ...Hey Uno & Friends, could you please not ask me to rate an app I've already rated??? I was asked to read it again and then I came back to find I had made that specific request not to ask me to re-rate something. Your app needs to be reprogrammed so it knows if someone has rated it or not. (sigh)

Tokens take too long to refill. Level up gives a few coins, why not a token refill? Tournament champion gets 4 tokens. 7 tokens for a day? Cheapskates! When do you want us to play, every 5 days? So cheap in giving prizes, guessing you want us to buy eh? I'll give myself a few weeks playing this game and am out. No daily prize wheel, just a daily "less than 20 coins" reward. Sooooooo cheap!

It's just ok.  Hard to see your entire hand at times and some of the rules are different than the actual UNO game itself. When I contacted this apps tech support, they sounded as if they could care less and said they will not be making any changes to the game.  So I play until they want me to buy credits then I stop.  When they give me more free credits I play again.  I like the game UNO, just not this one so much.  Why do I still play?  Hmmm, that's a good question.

Greatest game ever~~¤mean it.  The Updated game even better.  Need to be easier to play with Friends that you JUST made ~~maybe REPLAY!!!  😬 😲 😠 😐 😭  Friends where are you? Great for tablets.   I am UNO happy . Happy New years  .Oh don't terminate the game unless you just have to, I well try finding something other to do. Nothing Good ever lasts anyway.   Thanks for reading.  UNO POWER.

LOVE! Please DO NOT end the game! This app is perfect all the way around. Best card game app ever. SOOO many people are gonna be upset if you take it down, so leave it up! These uno players are ready to rock this app! You will never not have people playing. It would be kind of cool if you could create your own avatar though.. & pick outfits and such. Not necessary, but a fun little quirk (:

Classic UNO with a couple of modern twists and turns. I have never spent any real money in a game and I don't ever plan to, but here you also don't really need to. I've won many tournaments and got really far in the game without buying anything. You get extra coins by winning and completing daily tasks, as well as watching ads. But you're not forced to watch them. It's not just about luck. You have to play smart to win, just like any other card game. I love it.

comments: This game has been great to me forever, and I never had a complaint but this recent update has driven me here. The trophy cap is a real kick in the nuts and ruins the game for casual gamers like me. You now HAVE to advance through the games prestige system and keep resetting all your work just to help out a gang. And if you are in a strict gang like I am, they require 100 trophies a day. If I keep advancing, I won't be able to keep up with that. This is all a money grab by zepto now. They want you to have to pay to keep your machines strong so you can compete.

I love this game. I have been playing it for a very long time. I play it every single day. I like the new updates however it seems you are getting away from the original game and focusing more on ultimate machines. Increasing the prestige levels was awesome but you need to also add additional upgrades with them as well. I have over 100 paw upgrades that are completely useless to me at the moment.

Look this was a great game, worthy of it's previous accolades. Sadly since then it's been progressively ruined by an ever more aggressively enforced attempt to move to a pay to win model. Previously you could achieve anything in the game with a bit of hard work, then they tweaked it and you could achieve anything with a bit of hard work and team work. Sadly though what's happened is soft paywalls have been introduced, things you can't outright buy, but will only manage with financial outlay and change after change is being introduced with new soft paywalls and new ways to try and cash grab. The game is on a steady but rapid downward decline and to any new players I would avoid picking it up and investing your time in it now.

Great game, easy to play and a good time waster. One thing I would like to see in a future update  is a scroll bar for the parts in your garage. It would make it a lot easier than swiping through them, especially for those who have a lot of spare parts like myself. Other than that, awesome game.

This game sucks. First it is really hard to get good equipment. Then it is also very laggy. Everytime im playing the game it freezes right when im doing something. (Mainly when im customizing my car). Think about it when you are getting ths game to take up storage. If you'll excuse me now I've got a game to delete.

I had a bad day but this game fixed it,... Well enough. I've bin looking for a good game to play for a couple months now but until, like 2 days ago nothing had shown its self to me or caught my interest! This game is 11/10 to me! For probably about the next two month!

comments: U pay them a lot of money u will get easier bases to raid but uf u dont pay them u will get bases out of your reach. For example i just been upgraded to th10, i dont have infernos , i dont have 3rd xbow and im getting maxed out th11 bases to raid in crystal league. description: Join millions of players worldwide as you build your village, raise a clan, and compete in epic Clan Wars!Mustachioed Barbarians, fire wielding Wizards, and other unique troops are waiting for you! New Features:●	Journey to the Builder Base and discover new buildings and characters in a new mysterious world.●	Battle with all new troops, including Raged Barbarian, Sneaky Archer, Boxer Giant, Bomber, Cannon Cart, and the new Hero Battle Machine.●	Go head to head with other players in the new Versus battle mode.Classic Features:●	Join a Clan of fellow players or start your own and invite friends.●	Fight in Clan Wars as a team against other players across the globe. ●	Defend your village with a multitude of cannons, bombs, traps, mortars, and walls.●	Fight against the Goblin King in a campaign through the realm.●	Plan unique battle strategies with countless combinations of spells, troops, and Heroes!●	Friendly Challenges, Friendly Wars, and special events.●	Train unique troops with multiple levels of upgrades. PLEASE NOTE! Clash of Clans is free to download and play, however, some game items can also be purchased for real money. If you don't want to use this feature, please disable in-app purchases in your device's settings. descriptionHTML:
Join millions of players worldwide as you build your village, raise a clan, and compete in epic Clan Wars!

Mustachioed Barbarians, fire wielding Wizards, and other unique troops are waiting for you!

New Features:
● Journey to the Builder Base and discover new buildings and characters in a new mysterious world.
● Battle with all new troops, including Raged Barbarian, Sneaky Archer, Boxer Giant, Bomber, Cannon Cart, and the new Hero Battle Machine.
● Go head to head with other players in the new Versus battle mode.

Classic Features:
● Join a Clan of fellow players or start your own and invite friends.
● Fight in Clan Wars as a team against other players across the globe.
● Defend your village with a multitude of cannons, bombs, traps, mortars, and walls.
● Fight against the Goblin King in a campaign through the realm.
● Plan unique battle strategies with countless combinations of spells, troops, and Heroes!
● Friendly Challenges, Friendly Wars, and special events.
● Train unique troops with multiple levels of upgrades.

PLEASE NOTE! Clash of Clans is free to download and play, however, some game items can also be purchased for real money. If you don't want to use this feature, please disable in-app purchases in your device's settings. Also, under our Terms of Service and Privacy Policy, you must be at least 13 years of age to play or download Clash of Clans.

A network connection is also required.

Support: Chief, are you having problems? Visit http://supercell.helpshift.com/a/clash-of-clans/ or http://supr.cl/ClashForum or contact us in game by going to Settings > Help and Support.

comments: Why I liked it? Because it's a simple game that doesn't make you addicted to phone but rather enjoy going forward focusing your attention entirely on your finger. What comes to music as I read in comments, I always play games without music so haven't listened to this game's. I play this game as a reward after working hard and I'm entirely satisfied. There have been no crashes so far. Lots of ads, though.

I mean the game in itself is......alright  it could be a lot better.  I think the controls are rubbish and I understand it's meant to be "skillfull" but thats harder than skillfull, you can't even see where the circle is, this also adds to the game being bad. Having said all this you have also added rubbish music..... like you could have put something decent on. I get even more of an urge to uninstall the game every time I play it. Overall I definitely do NOT recommend this game. Game developers I hope you read this as it will probably help you to make the game better. I understand it would take a while but I don't care. If any of the game developers want to feedback on my feedback you are welcome to.Thank you.
It's a good game but... it's annoying cuz I keep falling because where the dot is I have to put my finger over it to move so I can't see where I am going.
This is game is ok if you are bored and don't know what to do.... however it becomes irritating after playing for a while.... overall its a nice game
I would like to report a bug. When you pause the game, moving obstacles keep moving. Someone would use this as a cheat
It is a great and fun game. Challenging and it works on your patience and timing. However it deleted all my progress for some reason and I lost all of the obstacles I unlocked, which was a lot

comments: Excellent storyline, graphics, and doesn't waste your time with ads. This is how the e type of games should be done. The only thing that would make it better is if they actually gave out gems. This is their 1 downfall - not receiving any gems at all. Therefore, you are forced to either buy them or select the choice you didn't really want in order to get the free choice. This, of course, changes your storyline. However, you can see at the end of each episode the percentage of your choices compared with other users and its normally in the 90 percentile. Still this is a wonderful game that I would highly recommend.
Awesome game but it take 4hrs to give only 2 tickets and u play for almost 10min and u dnt get extra diamonds.. Thats the only part putting me off the game. Also waaay to many ads!

comments: I like playing it, its a good time killer but why are there so many ads?! I cant play one song without an ad to advertise some other game! Why cant you put an option to watch 5 ads a day for 10 coins each ad or something? Its annoying being interruoted every ten seconds by something i dont care about. Other than that, the game is pretty good itself and its fun to play.

Cheetah Games, I hope you see this, because I've got a complaint. I've been playing piano tiles 2 for about 2 days and I'm level 11 or 12 I don't remember. However when I was leveling up I noticed that a song I like was missing from Level oh I don't know 5, 6, 7, I don't really know. I was looking for a song called the swan, and I could not find it. Then I went to a different tab in songs and I found it it wasn't in level 5, 6, or 7, but it was in level 65. When I found out about this, my favorite song being in level 65 which I will never get to because I'm not that patient, I nearly broke my phone for I was so enraged because of this change. Please change it back it's my favorite song. I hope you got this  but I know you don't.

Great time killer! On those nights I can't sleep, which is too often, this is the best app to turn my would be long night into an extremely short night. The time literally flies and before I know it morning is here. Couldn't ask for a more fun,challenging and interesting way to pass the time. But be careful, you will become addicted very quickly!

It is amazing no matter what I play this alot and still love it. Has great graphics great gameplay and I will never get bored. If I had to have one game on my phone except YouTube this would be my number one game so keep going but one thing you should make lots of more songs like really new songs

This app is great for passing time, I also love how you can play offline. Its very addicting as well. The only downside is that there are way to many advertisements, I can't even play one song without there being an ad

I mean the game is great! But all of these add-on power up stuff always being added ends up ruining the classic game for me. I love the good original design, no power-ups or anything too extra. I don't use them and find them annoying. It's a great time killer, and a real challenege.  But, as said before, the game is going too extra and I don't really like it.  Playing it is fun, the add-ons are not.

comments: Just started and it is quite full of ads. At least they let you end the ad after 5 to 8 seconds. I wish therr was a way to go back and do the tutorial again and I accidently pressed during the first one and missed how to land. Lots of trial and error on that one. Also would be nice to know how the scoring exactly works.

It's getting frustrating.. I'm into level 14, have up graded skills and equipment but yet still can't manage to get a bronz let alone a silver or gold in the very first jump in the game. Along with finishing a constant 16th about 95% of the time make me think it's rigged. What's up with that??

Fantastic concept and artwork and potentially amazing game ruined by a half arsed tutorial and lack of information, pure laziness.  The fun of the game turns to frustration as you get good distance and terrible scores, but why? You assume landings but the game gives you no information on correct technique. Also same for takeoff and mid air lift.   Come on devs its lazy and ruining a game with huge potential. Uninstalled...

By level 4 no matter what score i get the bots always get about 15 higher. 1 game i would get 130 and the bots would get 145. Then when i get 160 they still get 175 showing this is rigged. That makes it so annoying with a lack of help from the developers make it annoying otherwise would b 5 stars if these issues were fixed

The game has a great Idea to it, but it really needs so tweaking in the physics deparment of the game, on certain Stages I go further with a Bad Jump then a Excellent one, and the wind doesnt really play that much of an effect in the game. But overall great and fun game, amd very addictive.

This game is actually very good, I play a lot of mobile games as its normally all I have time for and this is challenging and fun, the career mode is good and also like the upgrades..  I will definitely be keeping this one on my phone for a while because it is a really cool game. If you don't like ads then click you back button to get rid of it from time wasting or spend the buck to lose them forever.. Well done on a cool game, make some more like it!!
description: Get ready for true winter madness!Presenting Ski Jump Challenge, the first mobile ski jumping game that’s so playable, you’ll never want to put your phone down. It’s so easy anybody can play it and so realistic that you can control all the actions of your ski jumper.- Create your jumper profile and develop their skills! - Level up and improve take-off and landing technique.- Compete on close to 90 ski jumping hills (with more coming soon) in career mode, unlock new countries and hills, spend your hard-earned money on fancy ski suits, skis and helmets!- Train before every competition, try your skills in all conditions and get ready to compete!- Challenge your friends in multiplayer mode! Play with your friends on one phone, FB multiplayer coming soon!You can feel like you’re watching a real ski jumping competition thanks to detailed graphics, advanced physics system and realistic sounds! Ideal for Winter Olympics!

comments: I'm not a downloading games on my phone or tablet kind of person but I saw this game and decided to try it out. I loved it and played it all the time but then one day it suddenly stoped working when I was doing so well. I couldn't open the game anymore I tried many things and didn't work. I started a new game all from the beginning I had 55 cash in my town and all randomly it showed I had like 20. This game just wants you to keep making purchases. If you don't it will block you out.

I love this game. I dont play a lot of games. Township just keeps getting better. Some things are a minor downfall to this game, like how you can usually get great items from the store, untill you need a product or item for a task or event item. Then unless you have the township cash to hire the dealer then its hard to get things done in time. Plus in order to complete some tasks, you have to sell everything in your barn to complete the task. You should be able to just harvest than sell without it subtracting it back from your task. But either than that its an awesome game...

Something different and fun. I usually don't play these type games, but I love TOWNSHIP! Still having so much  fun with every level. AMAZING FUN! WOW! The HALLOWEEN decorations were so cute, I can't wait for Thanksgiving and Christmas. Loved the Cranberries. I'm enjoying Township more and more with each level. Year of the Rooster.  Greetings we're all gussied up for the holidays. It's Easter season 2018 still playing.

If It I do make it on I can't help other players by going to there town. I paid money on this game and play faithfully everyday. I'm feeling some kind of way about this. Please fix this. description: Township is a unique blend of city-building and farming! Build your dream town! Harvest crops at the farms, process them at your facilities, and sell goods to develop your town. Trade with exotic countries. Open restaurants, cinemas, and other community buildings to give life in your town special flavor. Explore the mine to get resources and find ancient artifacts. Run your own zoo and collect animals from around the world.Are you ready to become a farmer and city-manager to build your dream? Let’s get started!Township features:● Different buildings and decorations you can use to create your dream town● Various crops to grow and later process at your factories● Fun, charismatic townspeople with orders you need to fill● Your town's mine packed with ancient artifacts to discover and collect● Lovely animals to take care of● Farms to manage and expand● Exotic goods brought from islands● A zoo to build where you can even breed animals● Country flags and famous landmarks you can use to decorate your town, like the Statue of Liberty, Big Ben, and many more!● Play with your Facebook and Google+ friends, make new friends in the game community create your own clans! Township is free to play, though some in-game items can also be purchased for real money.*Internet connection is required to play the game and enable social interactions, competitions and other features* Enjoying Township? Learn more about the game! Facebook: www.facebook.com/TownshipMobile Twitter: twitter.com/township_mobile Questions? Contact our Tech Support at support@playrix.com.
descriptionHTML:
Township is a unique blend of city-building and farming!

Build your dream town! Harvest crops at the farms, process them at your facilities, and sell goods to develop your town. Trade with exotic countries. Open restaurants, cinemas, and other community buildings to give life in your town special flavor. Explore the mine to get resources and find ancient artifacts. Run your own zoo and collect animals from around the world.
Are you ready to become a farmer and city-manager to build your dream? Let’s get started!

Township features:
● Different buildings and decorations you can use to create your dream town
● Various crops to grow and later process at your factories
● Fun, charismatic townspeople with orders you need to fill
● Your town's mine packed with ancient artifacts to discover and collect

comments: Best game

This is the best of its kind for mobile, and one of the best overall. The graphics and UI are nice and stylish, the controls are great, the gameplay is solid and it's generally just very fun to play. However, the game has some optimization issues. When you minimize it, it disconnects, and if you wait long enough it shuts down the entire game. I get that it was made like this to reduce background data, but come on, not everybody stays in the game all the time. It also takes longer than most games to connect. These are minor issues, but it would be great to see them fixed.

This game works good but the reason I gave it 2 stars is whenever I click on ranked games it shows leaver penalty and the time to wait is shown 00:00:00:00. After waiting for so many days,it is always showing like this and not allowing me to play ranked games.Hope you would look into this.

description: Are you ready for a no-nonsense, action packed first person shooter?Critical Ops is a fast-paced FPS that will test your reflexes and tactical skill.  Experience a critical antiterrorist operation. Fight for domination alongside your friends or show the world your skill by leading the individual scoreboard.  Join the competitive combat in the most skill-based portable FPS!Game currently in Alpha phase: Critical Ops is still under development, but you can download and play the game now! We will keep working on the game continuously to fix bugs, improve optimization and add a ton of new features and content to the game!The game currently features 4 game modes: Defuse, Team Deathmatch, Ranked Games, and Gun Game.In defuse the terrorists try to plant and explode a bomb while the counter-terrorists try to prevent the bomb from exploding.In Team Deathmatch the teams compete for dominance within a time limit.In ranked games, the players are awarded points for every game that they win.Gun Game is a game mode that is played in teams, but all players individually work their way through all the weapons in the game.Critical Ops is not and will never be pay-to-win: Purchase comes to customize your favourite weapons.Follow us on social media:Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/CriticalOpsGame/Twitter: https://twitter.com/CriticalOpsGameYouTube: https://www.youtube.com/user/CriticalForceEntDiscord: http://discord.gg/criticalopsPrivacy Policy: http://criticalopsgame.com/privacy/Terms of Service: http://criticalopsgame.com/terms/
descriptionHTML:
Are you ready for a no-nonsense, action packed first person shooter?

Critical Ops is a fast-paced FPS that will test your reflexes and tactical skill. Experience a critical antiterrorist operation. Fight for domination alongside your friends or show the world your skill by leading the individual scoreboard. Join the competitive combat in the most skill-based portable FPS!

Game currently in Alpha phase: Critical Ops is still under development, but you can download and play the game now! We will keep working on the game continuously to fix bugs, improve optimization and add a ton of new features and content to the game!

The game currently features 4 game modes: Defuse, Team Deathmatch, Ranked Games, and Gun Game.
In defuse the terrorists try to plant and explode a bomb while the counter-terrorists try to prevent the bomb from exploding.
In Team Deathmatch the teams compete for dominance within a time limit.
In ranked games, the players are awarded points for every game that they win.
Gun Game is a game mode that is played in teams, but all players individually work their way through all the weapons in the game.

Critical Ops is not and will never be pay-to-win: Purchase comes to customize your favourite weapons.

Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/CriticalOpsGame/
Twitter: https://twitter.com/CriticalOpsGame
YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/user/CriticalForceEnt
Discord: http://discord.gg/criticalops

Race to catch the fun with loads of FREE CHARACTERS and the SPECIAL NEW CHARACTER, PRINCESS ANGELA! She lives in a magical place called MEDIEVAL TOWN. comments: Just downloaded this app.  So far a very well executed app with excellent layout and controls/easy and fluid to use.  Much better than other Sodoku b/c no ads during actual game play!  The only "con" is that I cant put graphics behind gameboard. Only suggestion: Would like to see options for backgrounds like in Solitaire. This would truely make it a 5 star game!   Ps. I was not paid/reimbursed or otherwise incentivised for this review in any way.

I'm addicted to this game especially the daily challenge boards. Pros: pencil feature, all instances of the number Are highlighted when you fill in a cell. Con: the timer starts when board opens, would like it to start after filling in 1st cell. As others have said the ads are right below the numbers, too easy to tap when your on a roll.

I like this app, but it feels like it could be more educational. I get stuck on the expert puzzles and often have to use the hints, the way the hints just tell you the number in a selected square doesn't help me work out what I'm missing. If the hint could show me how I could reveal another number would be more helpful to me. Otherwise top notch app

It's a pretty decent sudoku implementation, far better than a lot of the other ones out there I should say. The only issues I have are firstly I do find the "penciled" numbers to be a little on the small side (on a 5.5" screen). I'd also say that for those of us that don't find the "expert" setting particularly difficult (without meaning to sound arrogant), it would be good to have a step above that. And finally a Google Play leaderboard would be a nice addition. None of these are massive problems, it's a good app as I said.

Great app. I can do Sudoku on the app with the 'write' facility for numerical notes and I like how it removes them automatically as you fill in other areas. But I still find it very difficult to do paper Sudokus because I can't fill in the right answers without loads of workings out on the more challenging puzzles. The app makes this aspect easy.

I would greatly prefer to start by touching a number rather than touching a cell.  I have to hunt for a cell with the number I am working with, touch that to show where all instances of that number are, then touch each cell and the number to place either the number or a note that this might be the number.  If I could select the number first, I would only have to touch each cell to place that number, then turn on "note mode" and touch each cell for a note.  Only half the taps per game, saving both time and the muscles in my arthritic hands!
description: Sudoku for beginners and advanced players. Whether you'd like to relax or keep mind active – pass your free time in a pleasant way! Get a small stimulating break or clear your head with sudoku. Take your favorite app with you wherever you go. Playing Sudoku on mobile is as good as with a real pencil and paper.Choose any level you like. Play easier levels to exercise your brain, logical thinking and memory, or try hard levels to give your mind a real workout. Our classic puzzle game has some features that make sudoku easier for you: hints, auto-check, and duplicates highlight. You can use them or complete the challenge without help – it's up to you! What's more, in our app each puzzle has one solution. You will find all you need whether you are playing your first sudoku, or you've progressed to expert difficulty.Features✓ Complete Daily Challenges and get unique trophies✓ Challenge yourself figuring out your mistakes, or enable Auto-Check to see your mistakes as you go✓ Turn on Pencil mode to make notes as on paper. Each time you fill in a cell, notes are automatically updated!✓ Highlight duplicates to avoid repeating numbers in a row, column and block✓ Hints can guide you through the points when you are stuckMore features- Statistics. Track your progress for each difficulty level: analyze your best time and other achievements- Unlimited Undos. Made a mistake? Just put it back quickly!- Auto-save. If you leave a sudoku unfinished it will be saved. Continue playing anytime- Highlighting of a row, column and box related to the selected cell- Eraser. Get rid of all mistakesHighlights• More than 5,000 well-formed puzzles• 9x9 grid• 4 perfectly balanced levels of difficulty: easy, medium, hard, and expert• Support both phones and tablets• Portrait and landscape mode for tablets• Simple and intuitive designTrain your brain anywhere, anytime!
descriptionHTML:
Sudoku for beginners and advanced players. Whether you'd like to relax or keep mind active – pass your free time in a pleasant way! Get a small stimulating break or clear your head with sudoku. Take your favorite app with you wherever you go. Playing Sudoku on mobile is as good as with a real pencil and paper.

Choose any level you like. Play easier levels to exercise your brain, logical thinking and memory, or try hard levels to give your mind a real workout. Our classic puzzle game has some features that make sudoku easier for you: hints, auto-check, and duplicates highlight. You can use them or complete the challenge without help – it's up to you! What's more, in our app each puzzle has one solution. You will find all you need whether you are playing your first sudoku, or you've progressed to expert difficulty.

Features
✓ Complete Daily Challenges and get unique trophies
✓ Challenge yourself figuring out your mistakes, or enable Auto-Check to see your mistakes as you go
✓ Turn on Pencil mode to make notes as on paper. Each time you fill in a cell, notes are automatically updated!
✓ Highlight duplicates to avoid repeating numbers in a row, column and block
✓ Hints can guide you through the points when you are stuck

More features
- Statistics. Track your progress for each difficulty level: analyze your best time and other achievements
- Unlimited Undos. Made a mistake? Just put it back quickly!
- Auto-save. If you leave a sudoku unfinished it will be saved. Continue playing anytime
- Highlighting of a row, column and box related to the selected cell
- Eraser. Get rid of all mistakes

Highlights
• More than 5,000 well-formed puzzles
• 9x9 grid
• 4 perfectly balanced levels of difficulty: easy, medium, hard, and expert
• Support both phones and tablets
• Portrait and landscape mode for tablets
• Simple and intuitive design

Train your brain anywhere, anytime!

Make Angela your very own superstar! Nurture her, sing to her, and feed her delicious treats. Just watch – she’ll become your new best friend!

AND MUCH MUCH MORE...
